player-scale.name: Player Scale
player-scale.description: Adjust the size of your player icon

enable-jump-boost.name: Enable Jump Boost
enable-jump-boost.description: Gives a small jump boost when player is scaled down

jump-boost.name: Jump Boost Amount
jump-boost.description: How much extra height to add when jumping with small scale

player-opacity.name: Player Opacity
player-opacity.description: Set the transparency level of the player

enable-mini-trail.name: Enable Mini Trail
enable-mini-trail.description: Adds a special trail effect for very small players

enable-rainbow-trail.name: Enable Rainbow Trail
enable-rainbow-trail.description: Makes the player cycle through rainbow colors with a trail effect

enable-auto-jump.name: Enable Auto Jump
enable-auto-jump.description: Automatically jumps to help navigate obstacles

enable-custom-gravity.name: Enable Custom Gravity
enable-custom-gravity.description: Modify the gravity affecting the player

gravity-multiplier.name: Gravity Multiplier
gravity-multiplier.description: Multiply the gravity effect (1.0 = normal, 0.5 = half gravity, 2.0 = double gravity)

enable-mini-death-effect.name: Enable Mini Death Effect
enable-mini-death-effect.description: Special death effect for small players

enable-enhanced-death-effect.name: Enable Enhanced Death Effect
enable-enhanced-death-effect.description: More dramatic death effects with screen shake and particles

speed-multiplier.name: Speed Multiplier
speed-multiplier.description: Multiply the game speed (1.0 = normal speed)

show-fps.name: Show FPS Counter
show-fps.description: Display current FPS in the top-left corner

show-attempt-counter.name: Show Attempt Counter
show-attempt-counter.description: Display attempt count in the top-right corner

show-progress-bar.name: Show Progress Bar
show-progress-bar.description: Display level progress at the bottom of screen

enhanced-practice-mode.name: Enhanced Practice Mode
enhanced-practice-mode.description: Additional features and information for practice mode

enable-instant-restart.name: Enable Instant Restart
enable-instant-restart.description: Quickly restart levels with a hotkey

track-level-stats.name: Track Level Statistics
track-level-stats.description: Keep track of level completion and performance stats

show-toolkit-button.name: Show Toolkit Button
show-toolkit-button.description: Add a toolkit button to the main menu
